description: The goal of this Standing Offer is to have 1 (one) qualified offeror available on an as and when requested basis to provide information to ESDC employees and executives, and their spouses in 5 key areas to help them plan for, prepare and transition into retirement.
full_summary:
** Tender Notice **

**Title:** Pre-Retirement Training

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01027602

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

**publications date**: February 24, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** April 5, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Solicitation Number:** 100021314

The Government of Canada is seeking a Standing Offer contract for Pre-Retirement Training services through a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA). The RFSA is published on the Canadabuy Solution (CBS), with the respective RFSA notice available for download.

**Background and Objectives:**

The Prime Contractor for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is tasked with providing Pre-Retirement Training services to its employees and executives. The training will focus on various aspects, including:

* Public Service Pension Plan
* Estate Planning
* Financial Planning
* Health and Nutrition
* Psychological Aspects of Retirement

**Requirements:**

The successful contractor will provide Pre-Retirement Training workshops, either in-person (in various time zones across Canada) or via live, remote sessions on Microsoft Teams platform. The training sessions will be conducted in both official languages: English and French.

**Contract Duration:**

The initial contract period will be two (2) years from the contract award date. ESDC reserves the right to exercise up to four (4) one-year contract extension options, each to be exercised independently.

**Eligibility:**

Suppliers that are not already registered on the Existing Supplier List (ESL) or are new to Canada are called upon to register with the Canadabuy Solution (CBS). The interested suppliers will have to access the RFSA document and its attachments to review the requirements.

**Submission Guidelines:**

The completeness and eligibility of submission will be evaluated against the requirements outlined in the RFSA. Proposals exceeding 30 pages in length, including appendices, are not allowed.

**Compliance with Trade Agreements:**

The RFSA complies with the amendments to several trade agreements, including:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
